Reviews.Content: enjoyed hotel genuine charm nice helpful staff cozy smoking bar lot drinks valued don´t smoke drink lobby resturant clean comfortable beds bathroom fancy luxury international channels tv restaurant beautiful excellent food wines satisfied 5night stay hotel hotels stayed travel lot

Reviews.Content: im week savoy hotel remains enjoyable providing refreshing antidote anonymous hotels location breakfast remains nicest civilised staff helpful yes lap luxury perfectly comfortable comments review august 2009 continue valid

Reviews.Title: “Unassuming old world charm at the Savoy”
Reviews.Author: JKay3
Reviews.Content: stay touch world charm home home comfort unassuming aura replete polite staff savoy partner stayed five nights late october 2011 thoroughly enjoyed stay nearing time savoy feel locals returning home day sightseeing hotel facing onto parking lot private apartment block super quiet night day rented economy biggest basic ive stayed nice bonus hall hang coat draw multigenerational eclectic type guest nice completely recommend whiff generic hotel

Reviews.Title: “Don't Expect the London Savoy!”
Reviews.Author: BuffaloManchester
Reviews.Content: situated fairly quiet street kudamm hotel doesnt look grand outside wellappointed service excellent looks bit tired dated floor plenty storage space bathroom unfortunately decorated dark green tiles suite windows directly onto street doubleglazed noise party change heating adjusted change trouble breakfast 1950 euros substantial delicious set nicely day ahead savoy probably worth 4 stars based service decoration slightly welllocated hotel ten minutes walk zoo station wouldnt choice stay
